long_description: Don't let a little bad weather ruin your hike. Pull on the REI Airflyte Outback hat with waterproof, breathable eVent(TM) fabric to keep your noggin dry throughout the day. eVent fabric with Direct Venting(TM) technology has a membrane structure that allows sweat vapor to escape to the outside of the fabric, meaning you're unlikely to overheat. Polyester mesh lining wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. REI Airflyte Outback hat has a 2.5 in. brim that shields your face from raindrops and snowflakes.
short_description: Don't let a little bad weather ruin your hike. Pull on the REI Airflyte Outback hat with waterproof, breathable eVent(TM) fabric to keep your noggin dry throughout the day.
